org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Interface IsThreshold

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultThreshold, Threshold

    interface IsThreshold
    Interface to map a threshold. Needed for standard ones.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary
